articles.title: Google to spend $1 billion on AI education and job training in the U.S.
articles.summary: Google is partnering with colleges to give students free access to its artificial intelligence tools.

articles.title: Former Tesla Leaders Start AI-Focused Automotive Company
articles.summary: Former leaders of Tesla Inc.’s supercomputer program have started a new artificial intelligence company focused on the automotive industry, according to people familiar with the matter.
articles.translated_title: Former Tesla Leaders Start AI-Focused Automotive Company
articles.translated_summary: Former leaders of Tesla Inc.’s supercomputer program have started a new artificial intelligence company focused on the automotive industry, according to people familiar with the matter.

articles.title: Researchers hacked Google Gemini to take control of a smart home
articles.summary: Cybersecurity researchers were able to control smart home devices by hacking the Google Gemini artificial intelligence assistant.
articles.translated_title: Researchers hacked Google Gemini to take control of a smart home
articles.translated_summary: Cybersecurity researchers were able to control smart home devices by hacking the Google Gemini artificial intelligence assistant.

articles.title: Can US Become Robotics Capital of the World?
articles.summary: White House artificial intelligence and crypto czar David Sacks is today but one of many who believe that America and much of the world will soon fall in love with actual robots that assist them in chores from folding laundry — as Tesla's Optimus apparently can already do — to taking out the trash, washing dishes, and performing other household chores. Robotic machines already are performing major functions in fields from manufacturing to land mine and bomb removal.

articles.title: How DeepSeek and Open-Source Models Are Shaking Up AI
articles.summary: Tech companies and academics have long wrestled with the risks and rewards of building open-source software. But the frenzy around generative artificial intelligence has lent new significance to the debate.
articles.translated_title: How DeepSeek and Open-Source Models Are Shaking Up AI

articles.title: Google invests $1 billion in AI education training over 3 years in US
articles.summary: Google announces $1 billion investment in artificial intelligence training and education initiatives across U.S. universities over the next three years.
articles.translated_title: Google invests $1 billion in AI education training over 3 years in US

articles.title: AI Investments Key for SoftBank Shares After $65 Billion Rally
articles.summary: After adding $65 billion in market value over the past four months, the fate of SoftBank Group Corp. shares is more firmly attached to the global artificial intelligence boom than ever before.
articles.translated_title: AI Investments Key for SoftBank Shares After $65 Billion Rally
articles.translated_summary: After adding $65 billion in market value over the past four months, the fate of SoftBank Group Corp. shares is more firmly attached to the global artificial intelligence boom than ever before.

articles.title: Arista’s Stock Jump Pushes CEO Ullal’s Wealth to $6.4 Billion
articles.summary: In the artificial intelligence gold rush, even pick-and-shovel companies like Arista Networks Inc. are seeing their fortunes swell. The hardware provider’s shares have more than doubled since April, reaching an all-time high on Wednesday.
articles.translated_title: Arista’s Stock Jump Pushes CEO Ullal’s Wealth to $6.4 Billion

articles.title: Court sides strikes down California law on election-related AI deepfakes
articles.summary: The AI deepfakes law came as there's been increased concerns about the quick advancement of artificial intelligence and its impacts on political candidates.
